message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $105, but I was thinking more in the range of $110. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm glad you're still interested, Bob! I can see you're willing to negotiate, so I'll meet you halfway between $95 and $110. How about $102.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $98. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I can do $106, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $100 is the most I can go. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
